scripts.dev:server: cd server && uv run python manage.py runserver
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: cd server && uv run python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.start:server: cd server && uv run python manage.py runserver
scripts.setup: npm run setup:server && npm run setup:client
scripts.setup:server: cd server && uv sync && uv run python manage.py migrate
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.lint:server: cd server && uv run python manage.py check
scripts.migrate: cd server && uv run python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: cd server && uv run python manage.py makemigrations
